snippet: A class in how to make your own wedding cake at Brooklyn Kitchen; an offbeat dining experience at the McKittrick Hotel in Chelsea; and other events this week.
lead_paragraph: Benefits A tasting to showcase restaurants and food markets in Midtown will be held Thursday from 7 to 9:30 p.m. at Vanderbilt Hall in Grand Central Terminal, $100, or $350 for admission at 6:15, to benefit the Grand Central Neighborhood Social Services Corporation. Tickets: grandcentralpartnership.org.
